sql.content: SELECT A.activityID ,A.activityCode ,A.templateID ,A.activityName ,A.activityTypeID ,B.activityTypeID AS "activityType.activityTypeID" ,B.activityType AS "activityType.activityType" ,B.infoComment AS "activityType.infoComment" ,A.x ,A.y ,A.z ,A.height ,A.width ,A.iconURL ,A.backgroudColor ,A.lineColor ,A.flagColor ,A.fontColor ,A.infoComment ,A.createrID ,A.creater ,A.createTime ,A.lastUserID ,A.lastUser ,A.lastTime FROM TActivityInfo A ,TActivityType B WHERE A.activityTypeID = B.activityTypeID AND A.templateID = ':templateID' ORDER BY B.orderNo ,A.activityID

UPDATE TActivityInfo SET lastTime = SYSDATE ,x = :x ,y = :y ,backgroudColor = :backgroudColor ,lineColor = :lineColor ,flagColor = :flagColor ,fontColor = :fontColor WHERE activityID = :activityID AND templateID = :templateID

UPDATE TActivityInfo SET lastTime = GETDATE() ,x = :x ,y = :y ,backgroudColor = :backgroudColor ,lineColor = :lineColor ,flagColor = :flagColor ,fontColor = :fontColor WHERE activityID = :activityID AND templateID = :templateID

UPDATE TActivityInfo SET lastTime = NOW() ,x = :x ,y = :y ,backgroudColor = :backgroudColor ,lineColor = :lineColor ,flagColor = :flagColor ,fontColor = :fontColor WHERE activityID = :activityID AND templateID = :templateID
